nodes.title: Add podAnnotations section to helm chart
Enable support for aws eks rbac and aws iam msk
Disable TRACE/TRACK method in Undertow for security reasons
add keyFormat and format query params to the view message link for topics
Add option for env variable for kafka_saslJaasConfig
Added support for AWS MSK IAM
add terraform "Running in Kubernetes (using Terraform and Helm Chart) "
add terraform "Running in Kubernetes (using Terraform and Helm Chart) "
Fixes #265. Update kafka-client to version 2.7.0 to support TLS v1.3.
added ssl connetion parameter for Schema registry
added new UI to publish payload on any topic
Added functionality to allow user to add a message to a topic partition manually
#221 Added support for Schema Registry with Protobuf
Introduce Read Only toggle to disable/enable topic create and delete flag
Added view all messages button in message inspector page
move security protocol out of isSecured block
Support passing protobuf descriptor to values.yaml besides mounting hostpath
Use getFullName instead of getName to take namespace
#164 Security Context for deployments in Helm Chart
Add support for protobuf delimited encoding
add missing default key in values
Updated the paths for .js and .css to not be absolute paths
Reduce number of calls to Kafka
Support message headers with null values
Protobuf form fields unreachable in some browsers
Add github actions to publish helm chart
Hotfix view messages form submission for Protobuf option
Add possibility to remove a topic
Update getTopicInfos to only fetch existing topics
develop topic deletion service, developing controller.
Total size for topic can be a misnomer.
Added annotations field in service.yaml and values.yaml
Search type descriptor in all proto files
Remove check for .proto file name to match Descriptor file name. Fixes #90
Provide type registries for protobuf json format
Add cmdArgs as an option for helm chart
Catch and handle UnsupportedVersionException in describeTopicConfigs
Pass command line arguments to the docker
Adding search filter on ACL page
New "format" parameter for handling deserialization of AVRO messages
Correction of getAcls not returning all acls
add new api endpoint for get consumers for a topic
Adding ACL table on Cluster view
Support for TLS/SSL and SASL-security broker connections
Minimal build on pull request, closes #11
Add a screenshot for the webui overview page
embedded google fonts and changed template
